post:
Host Mayo is a powerful & affordable [CPanel](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php) & [DirectAdmin Web Hosting](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php) provider since 2015. Over the span of last few years we have expanded our product range to cover all hosting products ranging from simple web hosting to enterprise level VPS and dedicated servers. We offer exceptional customer support. Our all web hosting plans come with following features:

Features of Web Hosting
*  Free SSL
*  CloudLinux
*  Multiple PHP
*  Pure SSD storage
*  Whitelabel Hosting
*  99% Uptime Guarantee
*  Private Name Servers
*  NodeJS, Pearl & Ruby
*  Free cPanel Migration
*  24/7 Technical Support
*  Latest cPanel with CloudLinux
*  Softaculous - Automatic WordPress Installation

**_Starter Plan - $9.6/Year OR 1.20$/Month_**

*  1 GB Disk Space
*  1 Domain
*  10 Sub Domains
*  10 Email Accounts
*  10 MySQL Databases
*  10 FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](http://hostmayo.com/members/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=1&couponCode=lifetime)

**_Economy Plan - $24/Year OR 2.4$Month_**

*  5 GB Disk Space
*  5 Domains
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order Now](http://hostmayo.com/members/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=4&couponCode=lifetime)

**_Unlimited Plan - $36/Year OR 3$/Month_**

*  Unlimited Disk Space
*  Unlimited Domains
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](https://hostmayo.com/members/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=161)

**PAYMENT METHODS**<br>We accept PayPal, Credit Card, BitCoins, LTC, ETH, Tron & others.

**Connect With Us**
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at admin@hostmayo.com.
Follow Us: Tweeter [@hostmayo](https://twitter.com/hostmayo/) || Facebook [fb.com/hostmayoservers](https://www.facebook.com/hostmayoservers)
